meanings.definition: Of or relating to a gradual change in a characteristic across a geographic area.
meanings.sent1: The clinal shift in temperature from the coast to the mountains was noticeable.
meanings.sent2: The clinal variation in plant species along the riverbank was fascinating to observe.
meanings.sent3: The clinal transition of colors in the sunset painted a beautiful picture.
meanings.sent4: Her mood showed a clinal progression from excitement to disappointment.
meanings.sent5: The clinal slope of the hill made it challenging to climb.
